thig3.2:1.3: I had not attained peace of mind,
thig3.2:1.4: and I had no power over the mind.
thig3.2:2.4: the aggregates, elements, and sense domains.
thig3.2:3.1: After I listened to her Dhamma,
thig3.2:3.3: I sat cross-legged for seven days,
thig3.2:3.5: On the eighth day I stretched out the feet,
thig3.2:3.6: I destroyed this mass of darkness.”
